root.name: 8 Eyes
root.description: Overview8 Eyes takes part in a post-apocalyptic future. The player controls a man named Orin with a falcon sidekick named Cutrus that can be controlled by a second player. The bird is also controllable in the single-player, however some may find the control scheme difficult. The goal of the game is to infiltrate the castles of the eight dukes and retrieve the stolen 8 Eyes, gems of unimaginable power that were formed in the explosions of the nuclear missiles that begat the apocalypse.This game is considered similar to Castlevania as it shares a very similar design with its visuals and level design, as well as having various sub-weapons which are powered by an item usually dropped by enemies.
